flawed_nl_solution:
Alice was able to stack 27 + 37 = <<27+37=46>>46 plates she already stacked.
The tower crashes when there are 83 plates - 46 plates already stacked = <<83-46=37>>37 plates she was able to stack before the tower crashed.
#### 37

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 64, not 46. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
